bug.author: kellyamanda
bug.description: Reported by a user: Today I was trying to run the Uber App tutorial and faced issue about python-dateutil version 2.8.1. The latest python-dateutil version is 2.8.1 and the supported one in streamlit is <=2.8.0. So I tried with 2.8.0 and it worked fine.

comments.comment: This isn't an issue with an Uber demo; it's an issue with the dependency: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/boto/botocore/issues/1872>boto/botocore#1872</denchmark-link>
